pkgmetadata.longdescription: Applied Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA) Functions // Provides functions that allow for convenient working with latent semantic analysis (LSA) and other vector space models of semantics. For actually building a vector semantic space, use the package 'lsa' or other specialized software. Downloadable semantic spaces can be found here: https://sites.google.com/site/fritzgntr/software-resources A description of the LSA algorithm can be found in Landauer and Dumais (1997) doi:10.1037/0033-295X.104.2.211 .
